required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Effect of Multiple Doses of Itraconazole and Rifampin on the Single-Dose Pharmacokinetics of Mitapivat Sulfate (AG-348) in Healthy Adult Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Two-Part, Open-Label, Fixed-Sequence Study to Evaluate the Effect of Multiple Doses of Itraconazole and Rifampin on the Single-Dose Pharmacokinetics of Mitapivat Sulfate (AG-348) in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: Part 1 of this study will determine the effect of multiple-dose itraconazole, a strong cytochrome P450 (CYP) 3A4 and P-glycoprotein (P-gp) inhibitor, on the single-dose pharmacokinetic(s) (PK) of mitapivat sulfate in healthy adult participants. Part 2 of this study will determine the effect of multiple-dose rifampin, a strong CYP3A4 and P-gp inducer, on the single-dose pharmacokinetic(s) (PK) of mitapivat sulfate in healthy adult participants.

detailed_description.textblock:
This study consists of 2 periods and 2 parts. Participants will be placed in Part 1 or Part 2, and cannot participate in both:
Part 1, Period 1 includes a screening period up to 28 days prior to dosing and treatment on Day 1.
Part 1, Period 2 includes a treatment period from Day 1 to Day 9 and a possible follow-up, up to 28 days after the last dose of study drug.
Part 2, Period 1 includes a screening period up to 28 days prior to dosing and treatment on Day 1.
Part 2, Period 2 includes a treatment period from Day 1 to Day 12 and a possible follow-up, up to 28 days after the last dose of study drug.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-Time Curve, from Time 0 to the Last Measurable Concentration (AUC0-t) of Mitapivat Sulfate with and without Itraconazole
primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and at various timepoints through 120 hours postdose

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-Time Curve, from Time 0 to the Last Measurable Concentration (AUC0-t) of Mitapivat Sulfate with and without Rifampin
primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and at various timepoints through 120 hours postdose

arm_group.description: Period 1: Day 1, participants will receive 20 milligrams (mg) of mitapivat sulfate. Period 2: Day 1 to Day 9, participants will receive 200 mg of itraconazole, once daily and 20 mg of mitapivat sulfate on Day 5.

Period 1: Day 1, participants will receive 50 milligrams (mg) of mitapivat sulfate. Period 2: Day 1 to Day 12, participants will receive 600 mg of rifampin, once daily and 50 mg of mitapivat sulfate on Day 8.

intervention.description: Participants will receive an oral solution as described in the arm description.
Participants will receive oral capsule(s) as described in the arm description.
Participants will receive an oral tablet as described in the arm description.
